comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content:
This patch here is split out and adapted from Judith Silverman's (Dec 5th) SOLR-6203 patch, the [un]marshalSortValue methods here combine the two convertSortValue methods in that patch.

Comments and reviews welcome, thank you.
